name: Verifier Labels
description: Adds verifier names and video links to Extreme Demons using the AREDL API.

show-label.name: Enable Labels
show-label.description: Show verifier information on Extreme Demons.

y-offset.name: Vertical Position
y-offset.description: Adjust the label height relative to the creator name.

show-youtube.name: Show YouTube Button
show-youtube.description: Show the link to the verification video if available.
